sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège cài de zuòfǎ hěn jiǎndān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La recette de ce plat est très simple.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The recipe for this dish is very simple.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān bùxíng, wǒ yǒu shì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est pas possible aujourd'hui, j'ai quelque chose à faire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today won't work, I have something to do.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǎinai jiā yǎng le hěn duō jī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Grand-mère élève beaucoup de poules chez elle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Grandma raises many chickens at home.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen jiā yǒu yī gè xiǎo yuànzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons une petite cour chez nous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our family has a small courtyard.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiān hēi le, wǒmen huíjiā ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait nuit, rentrons à la maison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's dark, let's go home.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhǎngdà hòu xiǎng dāng yīshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux devenir médecin quand je serai grand.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to be a doctor when I grow up.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 感冒是一种常见的疾病。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gǎnmào shì yī zhǒng chángjiàn de jíbìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le rhume est une maladie courante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A cold is a common illness.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ liǎng jīn píngguǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi deux jin de pommes, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me two jin of apples.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hé biān yǒu hěn duō rén diàoyú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de gens qui pêchent au bord de la rivière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many people fishing by the river.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他看了看表，已经十点了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā kàn le kàn biǎo, yǐjīng shí diǎn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a regardé sa montre, il était déjà dix heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He looked at his watch, it was already ten o'clock.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 大人说话时，小孩子要安静。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàrén shuōhuà shí, xiǎo háizi yào ānjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quand les adultes parlent, les enfants doivent être calmes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: When adults are talking, children should be quiet.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是一个老年活动中心。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè lǎonián huódòng zhōngxīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un centre d'activités pour personnes âgées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an activity center for senior citizens.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xià zhōu wǒ yào qù chūchāi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La semaine prochaine, je pars en voyage d'affaires.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Next week I will go on a business trip.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 因为下雨，所以我们取消了活动。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīnwèi xiàyǔ, suǒyǐ wǒmen qǔxiāo le huódòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Parce qu'il pleut, nous avons annulé l'activité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Because it rained, we canceled the activity.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de bàngōngshì zài sān lóu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon bureau est au troisième étage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My office is on the third floor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chāoshì lí zhèlǐ hěn jìn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le supermarché est très proche d'ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The supermarket is very close to here.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他被选为我们班的班长。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bèi xuǎn wéi wǒmen bān de bānzhǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a été élu chef de classe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He was elected as our class monitor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiáng shàng guà zhe yī fú huàr.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a une peinture accrochée au mur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a painting hanging on the wall.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen fēnkāi yǐjīng sān nián le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils sont séparés depuis trois ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They have been separated for three years.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wàng dài yàoshi le, zěnme bàn?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai oublié mes clés, que faire ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I forgot to bring my keys, what should I do?
